TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingContext extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 管理任何继承自 类的对象的 对象集合。

span.span: Manages the collection of objects for any object that inherits from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Windows 窗体具有至少一个对象，用于管理窗体的对象。Each Windows Form has at least one object that manages the objects for the form. 因为类为抽象，类的返回类型属性或。Because the class is abstract, the return type of the property is either a or a . 如果数据源是一个对象，可以返回一个属性 （而不是对象的列表中），是。If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the is a . 例如，如果你指定作为数据源，返回。For example, if you specify a as the data source, a is returned. 另一方面，如果数据源是一个对象，实现或、返回。On the other hand, if the data source is an object that implements or , a is returned. 对于 Windows 窗体上每个数据源，是否一个或。For each data source on a Windows Form, there is a single or . 因为可能存在多个 Windows 窗体，与关联的数据源可让你检索任何特定与数据源关联。Because there may be multiple data sources associated with a Windows Form, the enables you to retrieve any particular associated with a data source. > [!NOTE] > 使用时属性，创建一个新如果尚不存在。When using the property, the creates a new if one does not already exist. 返回的对象可能不会管理列表 （或任何列表），在你计划，这可能导致某些混淆。This can lead to some confusion, as the returned object may not manage the list (or any list) that you intend. 若要防止返回无效，使用方法可确定所要的已存在。To prevent returning an invalid , use the method to determine if the intended already exists. 如果您使用容器控件，如， ，或，用于包含数据绑定控件，你可以创建只是该容器控件和其控件。If you use a container control, such as a , , or , to contain data-bound controls, you can create a for just that container control and its controls. 然后，通过其自己来管理你的窗体的每个部分。Then, each part of your form can be managed by its own . 请参阅有关创建多个详细信息的构造函数同一数据源的对象。See the constructor for more information about creating multiple objects for the same data source. 如果你添加到窗体和它到数据集，该控件中的表的列与之通信的绑定的控件该表单。If you add a control to a form and bind it to a column of a table in a dataset, the control communicates with the of that form. ，反过来，与特定于通信为该数据关联。The , in turn, talks to the specific for that data association. 当你查询`Position`属性，它将报告该绑定的当前记录控件。If you queried the `Position` property of the , it would report the current record for the binding of that control. 在下面的代码示例中，控件绑定到`FirstName`列`Customers`表上`dataSet1`通过数据集窗体上。In the following code example, a control is bound to the `FirstName` column of a `Customers` table on the `dataSet1` dataset through the for the form it is on. ```vb TextBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName") ``` ```csharp textBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` ```cpp textBox1->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` 你可以添加第二个控件 (`TextBox2`) 到窗体并将其绑定到`LastName`列`Customers`同一数据集中的表。You can add a second control (`TextBox2`) to the form and bind it to the `LastName` column of the `Customers` table in the same dataset. 知道的第一个绑定 (`TextBox1`到`Customers.FirstName`)，因此它将使用相同，如两个文本框绑定到同一数据集 (`DataSet1`)。The is aware of the first binding (`TextBox1` to `Customers.FirstName`), so it would use the same , as both text boxes are bound to the same dataset (`DataSet1`). ```vb TextBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName") ``` ```csharp textBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` ```cpp textBox2->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` 如果将绑定`TextBox2`到不同的数据集，创建和管理第二个。If you bind `TextBox2` to a different dataset, the creates and manages a second . 务必要保持一致有关如何设置和属性; 否则为创建多个货币管理器相同的数据集，这会导致错误。It is important to be consistent about how you set the and properties; otherwise, the creates multiple currency managers for the same dataset, which results in errors. 下面的代码示例演示了几种方法设置的属性和其关联对象。The following code example shows a few ways to set the properties and their associated objects. 只要你在整个代码是一致，可以设置使用的以下方法之一的属性。You can set the properties using either of the following methods, as long as you are consistent throughout your code. ```vb ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1 ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1, "Customers").Position = 1 ``` ```csharp comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1, "Customers"].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1, "Customers")->Position = 1; ``` ```vb ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1.Customers).Position = 1 ``` ```csharp comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1.Customers].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1->Customers; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1->Customers)->Position = 1; ``` > [!NOTE] > 大多数 Windows 窗体应用程序通过将绑定。Most Windows Forms applications bind through a . 组件封装并公开编程接口。The component encapsulates a and exposes the programming interface. 使用时绑定，应使用通过公开的成员操作"货币"(即， `Position`) 而不是经过。When using a for binding, you should use the members exposed by the to manipulate "currency" (that is, `Position`) rather than go through the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建四个对象绑定五个控件 —和第四个控件 — 到几个数据源。The following code example creates four objects to bind five controls—a and four controls—to several data sources. 随后用于获取每个数据源。The is then used to get the for each data source. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要有多个实例相同的数据源，创建一个新和将其设置为继承自的对象属性类。If you want to have multiple instances for the same data source, create a new and set it to the property of an object that inherits from the class. 例如，如果你有两个对象 (从两个不同对象)，你可以设置的每个属性为不同的值。For example, if you have two objects (from two different objects), you can set the properties of each to different values. 这将导致每个组的数据绑定控件以显示相同的数据源中的不同值。This causes each set of data-bound controls to display different values from the same data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建两个新对象，并将分配到每个对象属性控件。The following code example creates two new objects and assigns each object to the property of a control. `GroupBox1` 包含`TextBox1`，和`GroupBox2`包含`TextBox2`(这可以通过使用方法类)。`GroupBox1` contains `TextBox1`, and `GroupBox2` contains `TextBox2` (which is accomplished by using the method of the class). 然后该示例添加的对象添加到两个控件绑定到的相同的数据源和数据成员的每个。The example then adds objects to the two controls, binding each to the same data source and data member. 该示例还显示使用的两个事件处理程序从控件设置属性不同对象。The example also shows two event handlers that use the from the controls to set the property on different objects. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件已过时，并始终引发时处理。The event is obsolete and always raises a when handled. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用此重载想不需要导航路径。Use this overload if the you want does not require a navigation path. 例如，如果管理一套对象使用或作为，因此不需要任何导航路径。For example, if the manages a set of objects that use an or as the , no navigation path is required. > [!NOTE] > 属性将始终返回，并且永远不会返回`null`。The property will always return a , and never return `null`. 请参阅类有关的可能的数据源的列表和有关创建控件和数据源之间的绑定信息。See the class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources. ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回三个对象： 一个用于、 一个为，和一个用于的属于控件。The following code example returns three objects: one for a , one for an , and one for the of a that belongs to a control. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载时管理一套为其数据源包含多个对象的对象。Use this overload when the manages a set of objects for which the data source contains multiple objects. 例如，可以包含多个对象所链接的对象。For example, a can contain several objects linked by objects. 在这种情况下，导航路径需要启用返回正确。In such a case, the navigation path is required to enable the to return the correct . > [!NOTE] > 属性将始终返回，当`dataMember`参数才有效。The property will always return a , when the `dataMember` parameter is valid. 它将永远不会返回`null`。It will never return `null`. 请参阅类有关的可能的数据源的列表和有关创建控件和数据源之间的绑定信息。See the class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources. 如果所需管理列表中，导航路径还必须以列表结尾。If the desired manages a list, the navigation path must also end with a list. 例如，下面的 C# 代码将绑定控件添加到订单日期的订单表中。For example, the following C# code binds a control to the order date in a table of orders. 导航路径包括、 ，和。The navigation path includes the , the , and the . 但是，必须仅使用检索和（解析为一个列表）。However, the must be retrieved using only the and (which resolves to a list). ``` // The navigation path for a Binding ends with a property. textBox1.DataBindings.Add ("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"); // The navigation path for the BindingManagerBase ends with a list. BindingManagerBase bmOrders = this.BindingContext [dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders"]; ``` 返回时，应使用相同的数据源，因为和修改仅的导航路径。When returning a , you should use the same data source as the and modify only the navigation path. 使用方法可确定所需已存在。Use the method to determine if the desired already exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用检索为特定的绑定。The following code example demonstrates how to use the to retrieve the for a particular binding. 它还演示如何处理事件以确保控件值之一更改时，绑定到同一数据源的多个控件保持同步。It also shows how to handle the event for the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeControlsAndData`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 引发 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
